column3:
Get the ads off the menu buttons! I wont play it in this version and I'll 
tell others to not download. Used to be great. Now it's almost impossible 
to play.

The ad banners clip through the menu buttons making it unworkable. 
Otherwise a 5/5
this game deletes my progress..super frustrating!!

remove the add banner or adjust the button below... review your update 
before you publish... it's not accessible anymore...

Been hopelessly addicted, but got new phone and can't restore purchases. Liked the game more with less ads. If I find out how to restore,  I'd give 5 üåü So, there's a second page in settings, very easy to restore in app purchases.  Thank you for an amazing game! Love the hexic spin on a classic.

Stay with me on this... It rocks! The power of two! Who knew binary values would be so fun! Actually this is an excellent learning tool. Binary place holders, basic factional denominators for music notes, reading tape measures, calculating recipes, identifying sockets,  plc registers....  4 out of 5...Full ReviewStay with me on this... It rocks! The power of two! Who knew binary values would be so fun! Actually this is an excellent learning tool. Binary place holders, basic factional denominators for music notes, reading tape measures, calculating recipes, identifying sockets,  plc registers....  4 out of 5 new apprentices can't read a tape measure!... so many young people can't comvert fractions for recipes.... and are clueless about fractions on socket sets. Our schools don't bother with the simplest basics used in everyday life.  And by the way: thanks for the revisions!

It's a great adaptation of 2048, and i love the auto play modes, especially for the really large puzzles.   I would have one request, though. Would it be possible to implement a single corner auto mode instead of, or in addition to, the current method of moving focus to another corner? I'd like for ...Full ReviewIt's a great adaptation of 2048, and i love the auto play modes, especially for the really large puzzles.   I would have one request, though. Would it be possible to implement a single corner auto mode instead of, or in addition to, the current method of moving focus to another corner? I'd like for it to simply stop if it can't make any moves closer toward the chosen corner. It would really help me to keep it organized, as I can't stop it fast enough to keep it focused even on "Very Slow".

A perfect mix of carefully chosen features. The only version of 2048 that I 
still play. A LOT. Thank you! - Clint S. July 2018 update: You WRECKED it! 
No more free undo??? I was about to break a million!
I love this game. Great time waster. Not addictive. But-please consider changing the daily and weekly scoring to accommodate points gained per day/week. Thank you :)
Just so you know, undoing the last step is a common part of apps, but you're not able to do that in the real game.  Stop complaining about that.

Controls are really bad! I tried survival mode several times but stopped due to the tiles not responding to my finger; I started survival mode one and five times in a row I flicked my finger across the screen and the tiles didn't do anything...fix the sensitivity or something devs and I'll rate high...Full ReviewControls are really bad! I tried survival mode several times but stopped due to the tiles not responding to my finger; I started survival mode one and five times in a row I flicked my finger across the screen and the tiles didn't do anything...fix the sensitivity or something devs and I'll rate higher.
Undoing the last step is an essential part of the game mechanics of 2048. Limiting it is like only allowing 20 left swipes... otherwise good game.
I don't mind - too much - the ad up in the left corner offering undos for installing a game, but every time it flashes, the game play hiccups for a split second. Annoying. Please fix!

A good game (although the biggest board is taking me weeks to complete). I like the different sized boards. Because you swipe the screen on this game (to move the tiles) Iam constantly, and accidentally, "tapping" on the ad banners . . . which is annoying.

Often doesn't pick up your movements at all but otherwise really good. The undo system is good  But ONE click of the wrong button and you can accidentally restart, losing hours of progress, and there's no way back to your game that you spent hours on? That's the whole app ruined for me. One single f...Full ReviewOften doesn't pick up your movements at all but otherwise really good. The undo system is good  But ONE click of the wrong button and you can accidentally restart, losing hours of progress, and there's no way back to your game that you spent hours on? That's the whole app ruined for me. One single false click and everything down the drain. Deleting since there's no button to undo such an easy to make mistake
Unable to disable constant notifications while not playing, game will not leave you alone if you don't play almost daily. Too annoying to keep it installed even if the game itself is fun...

Too good... Just reached the 65536 tile, and I'm forcing myself to delete the game - is just too addictive.  A very nicely done app - the hex tiles add a lot over the classic square tiles. The only thing I didn't like was that it was too easy to accidently click the buttons and ads at the bottom.

Simple and addicting Gameplay is easy to pick up, and it's a  fun way to pass time. Grid can also be changed based on size or shape to open up the play area and allow for higher scores.
Addictive This is a simple game, but very addictive and it will allow you to go way beyond the 8156 tile, so a game can last a long time and you can come back to it later.

most addictive game I can't stop anymore, having more than 50 million points and running for the 4194304 tile! But how to transfer this level to a new phone because the existing S4 must be reset to factory default because WiFi not working properly? I don't want to loose my nearly 1 year points and start with zero!!! gi...Full ReviewI can't stop anymore, having more than 50 million points and running for the 4194304 tile! But how to transfer this level to a new phone because the existing S4 must be reset to factory default because WiFi not working properly? I don't want to loose my nearly 1 year points and start with zero!!! give 5 stars if you can help me         1.11. please just let me know if its possible to transfer or not Thanks in advance

I'd rather just see a non intrusive ad at the bottom the whole time than have to waste my time watching ads that ...Full ReviewIunno what everyone else is on about, this app works fine and has plenty of board choices and other features. The only thing I'm not terribly happy with is the necessity to "earn" undos. I'd rather just see a non intrusive ad at the bottom the whole time than have to waste my time watching ads that only make me that much LESS likely to use the product advertised

Love it and lost it, removing it The game is addictive, but buggy. The first undo after exhausting all moves does not undo the last move. The game reset it self on me at least 5 times after some pretty impressive scores. The undo button is too close to the boarder, and you can accidentally use one of your previous undo moves. You c...Full ReviewThe game is addictive, but buggy. The first undo after exhausting all moves does not undo the last move. The game reset it self on me at least 5 times after some pretty impressive scores. The undo button is too close to the boarder, and you can accidentally use one of your previous undo moves. You can build up undo moves by watching an add, but it defaults back to 10 undos after the game hibernates. Too many  advertisement. Remove the bottom one.

Luv it but scared I luv the game and is addicted but some people are saying they accidentally lose their data. At least make checkpoints or let people save their games. Or maybe add coins to the game and your score at the end determines how many coins you get. But yeah this game is addictive and more time consuming a...Full ReviewI luv the game and is addicted but some people are saying they accidentally lose their data. At least make checkpoints or let people save their games. Or maybe add coins to the game and your score at the end determines how many coins you get. But yeah this game is addictive and more time consuming and it causes less stress but in the end if you lose you probably would be very mad you lost.
Love the game, but... There are many bugs. This game has shut down 3 times right before I was going to win. Also, the undo button has dropped from 36 to 26 without me touching it.

CowboyLuke After having this game for close to 2 years,  have gotten to 4637016 score.  Loved it.   Where did my game go?  If you don't restore my game, I'm done.  Will uninstall.   5 stars if it returns.   Unhappy.

DO NOT DOWNLOAD I had one of the top score on the leaderboard, and I wanted to get an even higher score, so I put a lot of my free time into the game, then I watched my game disappear right in front of my eyes. I don't know what happened, but when I switched modes, my highest tiles appeared in the hex 2x2 grid! Do ...Full ReviewI had one of the top score on the leaderboard, and I wanted to get an even higher score, so I put a lot of my free time into the game, then I watched my game disappear right in front of my eyes. I don't know what happened, but when I switched modes, my highest tiles appeared in the hex 2x2 grid! Do not download this game unless you really like wasting your time and being immensely disappointed.

There is no way to save the game.The game restarts without rhyme or reason. I watched it reset without even touching anything.There is no way to play to the end without being able to save the game so don't play until a save feature is added.
Fix it!!!!! Game restarts it doesn't save. If I have to close out and come back I want to be able to continue my game. Otherwise  what's the point. No one has time to play that long without stop.

Too unstable to be worth the time investment, just lost everything Reached over 2 million on a 5hex grid and watched it crash, losing everything. Also incredibly slow response to 'back' button as this seems the only way to exit (?), and memory use spikes. Also ads (which I accept as necessary evil) always play with flickering lines rather than normally and this see...Full ReviewReached over 2 million on a 5hex grid and watched it crash, losing everything. Also incredibly slow response to 'back' button as this seems the only way to exit (?), and memory use spikes. Also ads (which I accept as necessary evil) always play with flickering lines rather than normally and this seems to be a problem with the ad area as it happens when no ads are playing. Hex layout is fantastic, but this is far too unstable to play for more than one session at a time.

Killed With the last update, it began repetitively yelling to be connected to a Google account, not accepting a ‚Äûleave me alone‚Äù answer, not stopping when I went back to the home screen, every third second it wanted to connect. My Google Account Is None Of Your Business. Keep Out. Uninstalled.

Also, I do not trust any simple game that wants access to all my g+ information, including my private circles.  They are PRIVATE for a reason.  I consider this to be a huge security r...Full ReviewWhile trying to connect the game to a g+ account, I kept getting a pop up telling me the game had stopped running.   Also, I do not trust any simple game that wants access to all my g+ information, including my private circles.  They are PRIVATE for a reason.  I consider this to be a huge security risk.

Had the tiles just about lined up in what would be a spectacularly satisfying additive catharsis, when the entire game crashes, losing the 500,000+ moves I had methodically and painstakingly arranged just so. I really needed the catharsis on this extremely crap day, and losing all my data just minutes from the goal makes this crap day too much to handle. I hate that I got strung along for 100+ hours of stupid sliding numbers together and can't even say I beat the thing. (Which I could have easily done had it not crashed!)
